fees.description: Disconnection fee may apply when vacating your property and disconnecting gas to your property (or reading your meter where applicable). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for more details.
Reconnection fee may apply when moving into your property and connecting gas to your property (or reading your meter where applicable). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for details.
Connection fee may apply when moving into your property and connecting gas to your property (or reading your meter where applicable). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for details.
Credit card merchant service fee of 0.36% for all payments with Visa or Mastercard.
Credit card merchant service fee of 1.5% for all payments with American Express.
$10.90 (GST does not currently apply to late payment fees).
Incl. GST effective from 6 April 2020. Refer to www.energyaustralia.com.au/home/help-and-support/faqs/paper-bill-fee for details.

gasContract.terms: Please refer to our website www.energyaustralia.com.au for full terms and conditions.
gasContract.variation: The rates for Standing Offer (Home) may vary, either when the AER changes the reference price, or when we review our rates each year. We will notify you before any rate change occurs.
gasContract.onExpiryDescription: This contract continues for as long as you remain on the plan.
gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply. Please refer to www.energyaustralia.com.au/conditions-and-pricing/other-charges. You can avoid the payment processing fees by paying from your bank account using direct debit or BPay.
